name: erc20
description: This is an abstract contract that implements the ERC20 interface. It is meant to be used as a base contract for other ERC20 contracts.

scripts.coverage: yarn && forge coverage --report lcov && lcov --remove lcov.info 'test/*.sol'  -o lcov_filtered.info && genhtml lcov_filtered.info --branch-coverage --output-dir coverage --ignore-errors category && rm lcov.info && rm lcov_filtered.info && open coverage/index.html
